text: Tim Masthay (born March 16, 1987 in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania) is an American football punter for the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League (NFL). Masthay was not drafted but started his football career in 2009 with the Indianapolis Colts when he was part of their practice squad. Masthay's father, Dr. Mark Masthay is a chairman of the chemistry department at the University of Dayton and his mother is the Executive Director of TriState Habitat for Humanity in Cincinnati, Ohio. ==Other websites== *Tim Masthay's profile at nfl.com Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Green Bay Packers players Category:American football punters Category:Sportspeople from Pittsburgh
title: Tim Masthay
